root: ^Damnit! No how! how did you beat us!
^You made a promise, now tell us who told you to destroy our home!
^And if ya think of shutting your mouth, I'll open it by force!
^I don't want to hurt you more, so please tell us.
^Grrr! Fine! Her name is Cassandra Cheese, she told us to destroy the old house you lived in.
^Cassandra Cheese? The Cheese family are Noble merchants, why would she ask that of you?
^I don't know okay! She paid us half and said not to ask questions! Just leave us alone now that you have the answer!
^Oh no ya don't leave! You deserve even worse for burning our home!
^Willow stay calm! Please, let them go, I don't want us to become like them.
^You're better than that. Stay calm for us...
^...Okay, piss off and never come back!
^If you do, next time we won't stop her!
^So we have a target... Cassandra Cheese. I believe we can learn more about her at the town's market.
^We should continue our journey then, we will rest when we are near the town.
^Follow me girls, we should arrive at nightfall.
